pages.text: You can enchant any of the farms that use a Pickaxe in the recipe by combining the farm with an enchanted book. $(br)Only compatible enchantments can be used with the pickaxe farms. For example, you can't use Soul Speed on any of these farms. However, you CAN use Silk Touch or Fortune on any of the Farms. Fortune will increase the drop count on all of the farms, including the ones that Fortune doesn't normally affect in Vanilla.$(br)You cannot combine multiple books with the farm at the same time. However, you are able to combine multiple enchantments onto a single book, then combine that with the farm. $(br)If you place the farm in the crafting grid with nothing else, it will remove ALL of the enchantments.
